name: Miss Kitty and The Dragon Princess
name_original: Miss Kitty and The Dragon Princess
description:
This is a game made in collaboration with a few friends for the 

Magical Girl Game Jam #7

You will take control of the heroic duo of Miss Kitty and Princess Nia on their mission to thwart the dragon known as Akaijo, The Bone Serpent.

Story:         

Nia's father, the king of Ice Dragons, Dovaden has been at odds with Akaijo ever since the conclusion of a bout of juicy drama that involved a love triangle. Long story short, Akaijo didn't get the girl and now he's got a grudge against Dovaden. His pettiness knows no bounds. He stopped sending birthday cards every year, ghosted him on SnapDragon, and for Christmas he refuses to send anything but an ugly sweater. Nia isn't spared of his wraith either and his most recent antic finally made her snap.

The moment Nia arrived at the Sakura Isles with her girlfriend Kaylee, the famous magical girl with the moniker Miss Kitty,  he sent his army of oni to ruin their fun. But Nia and Miss Kitty aren't going to take this lying down.  Enough is enough. They've been planning this trip for months! So it is your job as the player to fight through waves of oni using Nia as your sword and Miss Kitty as your shield and take down Akaijo.

Controls: 

W, A, S, D to move

SPACE to shoot

Q to switch character

How to Play:
